full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Title in English: *Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audits for the Industry Relations and Innovation Programs Division (IRIPD) Suite of Canadian Forest Economy Programs*
Title in French: *Audits des bénéficiaires et des accords de contribution dans le cadre des programmes de l'économie forestière canadienne de la Division des relations avec l'industrie et des programmes d'innovation (DRIPI)*

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: *cb-602-55755553*
* Solicitation Number: *NRCan-5000076633*
* Tender Closing Date: *2024-01-05T14:00:00*
* Expected Contract Start Date: *2024-01-02*
* Expected Contract End Date: *2026-03-31*
* Tender Status: *Expired*

## Supply Arrangement

* Current Amendment Number: *8*
* Solicitation Number: *NRCan-5000076633*
* Expected Award Date: Not specified in the tender announcement

## Description of the Contract

* Requirement Type: Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement
* Request for Proposal (RFP) will establish contract(s) to perform Recipient/Contribution Agreement Audits
* Audits will be performed in accordance with the Statement of Work in Annex A

## Funding

* This contract will be funded by Natural Resources Canada

## Business Identification

* The following North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes are applicable to this tender:
	+ 561110 - Facilities Support Services
	+ 561990 - All Other Support Services
	+ 561210 - Employment Agencies
	+ 561320 - Temporary Help Services
* The following United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) codes are applicable to this tender:
	+ 77101802 - Corporate environmental auditing services
	+ 84111600 - Audit services
	+ 84111601 - Year-end audits

## Trade Agreements

* This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
